sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief discovery of the kingdome of Antichrist and the downfall of it hasteth greatly. With a difference betwixt the ordinances of Christ and of Antichrist. This was written by One the world calleth a Quaker, in March 1653. R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.
[2], 22 p.
s.n., [London : 1653]
"One the world calleth a Quaker" = Richard Farnworth. Caption title on p. 1 reads: "A discovery of Antichrists Kingdome, and the downfall of it hasteth greatly."; caption title on p. 11 reads: "The difference betweene the ordinance of Christ and of Antichrist.". Tightly bound and cropped, with some loss of print. Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
=======

[2], 22 p.
s.n., [London : 1653]
"One the world calleth a Quaker" = Richard Farnworth. Caption title on p. 1 reads: "A discovery of Antichrists Kingdome, and the downfall of it hasteth greatly."; caption title on p. 11 reads: "The difference betweene the ordinance of Christ and of Antichrist.". Tightly bound and cropped, with some loss of print. Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
